summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 23, 2019. It records the official inmate count and includes a roster entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody at the time. The document is significant as it provides administrative evidence of Epstein's incarceration shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate 57084-056 on the inmate roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, on July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Harrison
persons.context: Appears as the print name on one of the official count slips, indicating they were a staff member involved in the inmate count process.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 776 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate (Register Number 57084-056) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 23, 2019.
The official inmate count at the facility on that date recorded a total of 776 inmates.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons administrative form for tracking inmate population and counts.
The date of the document (July 23, 2019) places it approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
